0: Walking from hotel to Staples center is not very romantic
When we arrived the young black haired Caucasian with glasses at the front was short with us and rudely spoken
The bathrooms where tiny and impossible to get ready with two people
From the musty smelling sheets and nasty smelling rooms to cardboard covered holes in the wall and strange pit like bathtub shower that is a huge risk for anyone using it
the valet charge should have been included in the room price
the only reason why I slept here is because the room was already paid for and it was after midnight
The location was a bit sketchy we asked for a cab the morning we were leaving and they did not have one for us
The most frustrating short coming was no reading light near the bed in fact to turn off the nearest light to the bed you needed to get out onto a raised platform
It is also under heavy renovation it should be nice in about a year
Asking to much for the security deposit 100 a day
1: Style of hotel is nice the lounge area is modern and with a nice atmosphere
The room was spacious and beautiful
Thursday night at the Mayfair super relaxing and enjoying the vibe here
However it was better than expected and for the price friendly staff we would stay again
Convenient coffee place and restaurant with great choices
The hotel lobby was one of the best we have seen
The loby downstairs area is really nice and upon checking in the people at the desk were nice as well
Would definitely stay again but probably request different room
